title: High Job Failure Rate (Queue Jobs)
description: This monitor tracks the failure rate of queue jobs in n8n. A high failure rate indicates issues with job processing that may require investigation of worker logs and job configurations.

definition.name: [n8n] High Job Failure Rate (Queue Jobs)
definition.query: avg(last_15m):( sum:n8n.queue.job.failed.count{*} by {host}.as_rate() / ( sum:n8n.queue.job.failed.count{*} by {host}.as_rate() + sum:n8n.queue.job.completed.count{*} by {host}.as_rate() ) ) * 100 > 10
definition.message: {{#is_alert}}Queue job failure rate on {{host.name}} exceeded threshold: {{value}}% (threshold: {{threshold}}%).{{/is_alert}}{{#is_warning}}Queue job failure rate on {{host.name}} elevated: {{value}}%.{{/is_warning}}{{#is_recovery}}Job failure rate on {{host.name}} returned to normal.{{/is_recovery}}

options.escalation_message: Job failure rate still elevated. Check worker logs.
